Indicates DSAccess problems caused by incorrect Domain Name System (DNS) configuration.
Dsaccess could not find any global catalog servers in the enterprise.
Indicates DSAccess problems caused by incorrect Domain Name System (DNS) configuration.
Promote one or more of your domain controllers to a global catalog to allow dsaccess to function properly.

The virtual memory necessary to run your Exchange server is fragmented in such a way that normal operation may begin to fail. It is highly recommended that you restart all Exchange services to correct this issue.

The virtual memory necessary to run your Exchange server is fragmented in such a way that normal operation may begin to fail. It is highly recommended that you restart all Exchange services to correct this issue.

This Warning event indicates incorrect security settings on mailbox-enabled user accounts. Multiple occurrences of this event will cause performance issues on the Exchange Server computer. Check http://support.microsoft.com/kb/883527
